page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT AND UNEMPLOYMENT
page.content: The area studied by our school is not industrialised, although there are{two small industrial estates and a large { {bakery}and{brewery}in it.Some firms employ over 100 people and some less than 5 people.Goods are exported all over the world by firms making polypropylene flexible boxes and railway track maintenance equipment. Other modern technology exported world wide is in the field of{broadcasting, {electronics}and{computers.}Small firms are more common and they make toffee apples, chocolate, kitchen equipment and greeting cards.The area is a black one for unemployment in the county and in a survey we carried out there were more men employed than women. The majority of the firms take advantage of the{Government Youth Training {Scheme. }
